actions.text: Amendment SA 3442 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

Amendment SA 3442 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Boozman. (consideration: CR S4188; text: CR S4188) To strike the requirement that the Commander of the United States Transportation Command be a member of the Board of Visitors to the United States Merchant Marine Academy and that a substitute member of the Board be an officer of the United States Transportation Command.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3442 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3442 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Boozman.

purpose: To strike the requirement that the Commander of the United States Transportation Command be a member of the Board of Visitors to the United States Merchant Marine Academy and that a substitute member of the Board be an officer of the United States Transportation Command.
